text.style: font-family:Verdana; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: What is an RSS feed

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Put simply RSS is a format for

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: easily sharing content

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: on the web. What type of content? Commonly things such as news items, job adverts, or marketing communications are ideal candidates for RSS although almost any list orientated information can be suitable.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Fundamentals

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Some key points to be aware of from the outset include:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: involved - for publishers and content providers details of new content can be accessed by a much broader audience, for web site producers new content can be easily integrated into web sites or portals, and for end users easy access to new content is greatly facilitated.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: An RSS file (also known as an RSS feed or

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: to a web page. Typically the full content itself is made available separately and can be accessed by the link in the RSS file.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Utilising an RSS feed is straightforward. Once an RSS file is made available on a web site, interested parties can simply gather the file from the site and

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: of RSS. Although this has led to some confusion and debate it is not a major issue as almost all RSS applications like Rss Bandit can handle any RSS version.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: ' depending on who you ask and which version they are speaking about.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: . If you already know a bit about HTML and XML then RSS will be a breeze!

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: The terms

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Syndication

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: and

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Aggregation

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: are often used in the context of RSS. Dictionary definitions of 'syndication' are along the following lines:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Distributing

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: ' a news article or picture through a syndicate for publication in a number of newspapers or periodicals simultaneously.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Syndication

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: ' is often used in the context of RSS because it is all about distributing content for reuse.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Because RSS is an XML format and not simple HTML, RSS files must be processed (or '

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: parsed

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: ') before they can be displayed. On web sites they are often visualized as links to the RSS file resource with a small orange icon named XML or RSS:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: In the firefox web browser they are named live bookmarks while IE7 uses so called webfeeds and visualized with this icon:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: . RSS aggregators like Rss Bandit are applications which provide the means to read the content of RSS files.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: An RSS aggregator is a program that reads RSS documents and displays new items. Most aggregators make it possible to subscribe to a feed by simply entering the URL to the RSS document. See also

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Other types of applications can also take advantage of RSS to syndicate content. For example, most of the major news sites including Wired, CNet, Yahoo!, and NPR News provide RSS feeds. Check out

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: and

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: or use

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: to find sites that support RSS.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Also our project hosted at

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: provides

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: to syndicate news related to RSS Bandit project. This is a great way to keep up with news and release downloads.
